body.p: “Against the wall in front of young Farrar’s house a scroll shaped slender fern now 3 inches high-stem invested with narrow shining brown scales 1/3 inch long. The S. tristis now out (not out May 1st) ap the 3d The same of the Sweet Fern. The red maple keyes are now about ¾ inch long (with stems-) I see no leaves on the black-red-or shrub oaks now –their buds expanding & showing a green, or yellowish point-but they still hang on the white oak.”
